title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt Snapshot

view.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt
view.subtitle: Second concurrent booking created.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

requestBody.title: Create resources representing hosts/assets/venues API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Multi-Resource Event. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
